mapper.select: select pjtNo, pjtNm from project_tb group by pjtNo order by pjtNo asc
select companyNo, companyNm from company_tb group by companyNo order by companyNo asc
mapper.insert: insert into sign_tb (pjtNo, companyNo, signMonth, bpPerson, grade, birth, startDt, endDt, signMm, price, sumPrice) values (#{pjtNo}, #{companyNo}, #{signMonth}, #{bpPerson}, #{grade}, #{birth}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{signMm}, #{price}, #{sumPrice})
mapper.select: select a.sign_idx sign_idx, a.pjtNo pjtNo, b.pjtNm pjtNm, a.companyNo companyNo, c.companyNm companyNm, a.signMonth signMonth, a.bpPerson bpPerson, a.grade grade from sign_tb a, project_tb b, company_tb c where a.signMonth = ${signMonth} and a.pjtNo = b.pjtNo and a.companyNo = c.companyNo group by a.sign_idx, a.pjtNo, b.pjtNm, a.companyNo, c.companyNm, a.signMonth, a.bpPerson, a.grade order by a.signMonth asc, a.pjtNo asc, c.companyNm asc, a.bpPerson asc

select a.sign_idx sign_idx, a.pjtNo pjtNo, b.pjtNm pjtNm, a.companyNo companyNo, c.companyNm companyNm, a.signMonth signMonth, a.bpPerson bpPerson, a.grade grade, a.birth birth, a.startDt startDt, a.endDt endDt, a.signMm signMm, a.price price, a.sumPrice sumPrice from sign_tb a, project_tb b, company_tb c where a.sign_idx = ${sign_idx} and a.signMonth = ${signMonth} and a.pjtNo = b.pjtNo and a.companyNo = c.companyNo

select a.sign_idx sign_idx, a.pjtNo pjtNo, b.pjtNm pjtNm, a.companyNo companyNo, c.companyNm companyNm, a.signMonth signMonth, a.bpPerson bpPerson, a.grade grade from sign_tb a, project_tb b, company_tb c where a.signMonth = ${signMonth} and a.pjtNo = b.pjtNo and a.companyNo = c.companyNo and a.pjtNo LIKE concat('%', #{pjtNo}, '%') and c.companyNm LIKE concat('%', #{companyNm}, '%') and a.bpPerson LIKE concat('%', #{bpPerson}, '%') group by a.sign_idx, a.pjtNo, b.pjtNm, a.companyNo, c.companyNm, a.signMonth, a.bpPerson, a.grade order by a.signMonth asc, a.pjtNo asc, c.companyNm asc, a.bpPerson asc
mapper.update: update sign_tb set pjtNo = #{pjtNo}, companyNo = #{companyNo}, bpPerson = #{bpPerson}, grade = #{grade}, birth = #{birth}, startDt = #{startDt}, endDt = #{endDt}, signMm = #{signMm}, price = #{price}, sumPrice = #{sumPrice} where sign_idx = ${sign_idx} and signMonth = ${signMonth}
